column5: Is this how you use one of these things?  I have one in my basement, but I'm not quite sure how it works.  Maybe I'll try this....  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L4QmpyfS3fM
Love seeing this kind of appliace abuse:clapping: ka-ching...ka-ching $$$$$$$
Here hold my beer and the camera and watch this...Oh crap, ahh honey somthing happened to the garden.....lol
Some of the comments on the youtube page made me chuckle.
ha ha ha ...his wife is gonna kick his ass for those flowers...
